titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey a parcel of land located in Pittsburg County, Oklahoma, to the Choctaw Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/16/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to convey a specified parcel of public land in Pittsburg County, Oklahoma, to the Choctaw Nation. Sets forth that the land must be used for public purposes in perpetuity, or the United States may reclaim it.
